sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世紀，芭蕾漸漸地發展成爲了一種舞臺表演。

sentences.english: "The Nutcracker" is one of the most popular ballets in the world.
sentences.chinese: “胡桃夾子”是世界上最著名的芭蕾舞劇之一。

sentences.english: Noverre began ballet-making as it is known today.
sentences.chinese: 諾弗爾開始編導出我們今天所看到的芭蕾舞。

sentences.english: Who wrote the ballet Swan Lake?
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞劇《天鵝湖》是誰寫的？

sentences.english: He performed in long and complex ballets.
sentences.chinese: 他的表現在漫長而複雜的芭蕾舞劇。
芭蕾舞演員連續用腳尖旋轉。

sentences.english: His passion for the ballerina soon congealed.
sentences.chinese: 他對那位芭蕾舞女的熱情很快就冷下來了。

sentences.english: Assigns the movement to formulate every four years by the water ballet movement Technical committee.
sentences.chinese: 指定動作每四年由水上芭蕾運動技術委員會重新制定。

sentences.english: Center work means ballet exercises performed without support.
sentences.chinese: 重心訓練是一種不靠支持物的芭蕾訓練。

sentences.english: Emily hopes to carry out her dream to be a ballerina.
sentences.chinese: 愛蜜莉希望能實現當芭蕾舞者夢想。

sentences.english: Cheaper ballet pumps are particularly prone to do this.
sentences.chinese: 便宜的芭蕾舞鞋特別容易造成這種情況。

sentences.english: The single- minded daily discipline necessary in ballet was foreign to him.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞必須每大專心訓練，這對他來說是格格不人的。

sentences.english: To perform ballet, you need to get special training.
sentences.chinese: 要演出芭蕾，你需求接受非凡熬煉。

sentences.english: and also the American Ballet Theater.
"Goe" is a ballet of complementary patterns intertwining across the board.
sentences.chinese: 圍棋，是一種交織在棋盤上的黑白圖案形成的芭蕾。
